synopsis.text: Yomiyama North Middle School's Class 3-3 has been haunted by a chilling atmosphere and a deep-seated secret since the tragic death of a popular student named Misaki in 1972. In the spring of 1998, Kouichi Sakakibara transfers to this very class and is immediately struck by the fearful demeanor of his classmates. Drawn to the enigmatic Mei Misaki, a girl with an eyepatch who seems to be ignored by everyone else, Kouichi is determined to uncover the truth behind the eerie phenomenon plaguing the class. As he delves deeper into the mystery, he finds himself entangled in a series of inevitable, tragic events that threaten to reveal the dark secrets of Yomiyama. With the lives of his classmates at stake, Kouichi and Mei must confront the sinister forces at work, even if it means paying the ultimate price.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
